job.title: Junior Software Engineer
job.description: The Junior Software Engineer assists in design develops code tests installs and maintains application systems based on perdefined requirements for programs functions services and other related software componentsbrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliAssists in design solutions for approved projects and change requests of moderate complexity and riskliliAssists in design of software technicians based on provided detailed requirementsliliAssists in the develop document and present design solutions and supporting rationaleliliAssists in early stages of system analysis and programming activitiesliliParticipate in application and program code according to business and technical requirementsliliConvert basic specifications into equivalent infrastructure and application software structuresliliCode and unit test as part of a development teamliliSubmit software products for review of compliance with best practices standards and enterprise architecture code reviewliliParticipate in quality assurance and testing to achieve quality objectivesliliParticipate in quality assurance and testing activities according to planned schedulesliliLearn use and gain experience with testing tools and techniquesliliPerform technical support activities required for execution of test plansliliPerform root cause analysis and defect correction as indicated by test resultsliliEvaluate outcomes report results and document findings according to current standardsbrbrliulstronguBasic QualificationsbrustrongulliBachelors in Computer Science or related field lili2 years of IT experience in application developmentliliConcept of programming languages liliNet and Microsoft Stack technology brbrliulstronguPreferred QualificationsbrustrongulliDomain Driven ArchitectureliliAzure Cloudliul
